transcript:
Customer: Hanji sir.
Executive: Sir ye Tanet group ne aapko number bheja hai kuch.
Customer: Group mein?
Executive: Hanji hanji. Isme jo last wala bheja hai inse baat kariye. Abhi inka subah order tha kareeb 50000 card ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Inse baat karke dekhiye aap. Pehle to haan theek hai ban jayega, 10000 banna hai haan theek hai ban jayega.
Customer: Ab aati mujhe inka muh band ho gaya. Puchiye abhi inki lead kaise uthegi.
Executive: Ab to phone nahi utha rahe?
Customer: Nahi abhi baat kar lenge.
Customer: Are phone nahi utha rahe.
Executive: Are aap inse puchiye kya nahi baat hui. Ek hota hai bhaiya sir aap bhi andhe ho ke agar aapko kaam karana hai 1 lakh ka. To haan theek hai ho jayega. Humne bola haan theek hai rate de diya sab kuch lekin aap data to do aap.
Customer: Hai na?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Aur abhi ek mam hamare lead di thi humne baat ki. Usko humne apne bhaiya se baat karwai. Bola usne bhej diya.
Customer: Haan bas.
Executive: Ye cheez ho raha hai. Ab isko contact kariye aur ye jo number aa rahe hain isme jo aaya hai ek Niketa karke hain unko 500 dori chahiye. Baat ki hai nahi chahiye.
Customer: Hai na?
Customer: Chalo main puchhta hu ek baar inko bhi se baat karta hu.
Executive: Isko dekh lijiye. Ek baar matlab.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hanji hanji.
Executive: Ye requirement chahiye to isko dale na. Ab nahi chahiye to isko kya matlab hai isko dene ka.
Customer: Nahi hum thode dal rahe hain inko wo to jo requirement hai tabhi to feed ho rahi hai sir.
Executive: Wahi cheez nahi wahi cheez bol raha hu ye aise hi requirement aa rahi hai.
Customer: Main abhi se bhi call karwa raha hu aapko call back karwa ke puchhte hain na.
Executive: Main aur number bhejta hu aise hi aur bhi hain mere paas.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting proper buyleads.

- Customer is not getting a response.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the issue.

- Executive will send more numbers.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, requirement, contact
